Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: These rapid assays detected mutations in 76 % of Costa Rican patients ( 3 ) , 50 % of Norwegian patients ( 1 ) , 25 % of Polish patients ( 4 ) , and 14 % of Italian patients ( 1 ) , as well as in patients of Amish / Mennonite and Irish English backgrounds .

Let's think step by step.

| Norwegian patients |
| Polish patients |
| Italian patients |
| Amish / Mennonite patients |
| Irish English patients |

Note that the entities are presented exactly as they appear in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease":

* "patients of Amish / Mennonite and Irish English backgrounds" - This sentence does not mention any specific disease, but rather the ethnic background of the patients.
* "rapid assays" - This is a medical test or procedure, not a disease entity.
